title: Our Declaration - author suggests readers should

content.question: In the final paragraph (lines 54-62), the author suggests that readers should do which of the following?

choices.label: Form groups to further analyze the language of the Declaration
Use their own experience to understand the motives underlying the Declaration
Answer the questions in the paragraph prior to reading the Declaration
Take responsibility for their own preconceived ideas about the Declaration

content.answer: Use their own experience to understand the motives underlying the Declaration

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
